articles.title: Mergers and Acquisitions Soared This Year. 2026 Could Be Even Bigger.
articles.mainIdea: Mergers and Acquisitions Soared This Year. 2026 Could Be Even Bigger.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Mergers and Acquisitions Soared This Year. 2026 Could Be Even Bigger.. Mergers and acquisitions rose this year — and they can keep rising. Total M&A dollars so far this year rose to $4.39 trillion, according to data from London Stock Exchange Group. The increase in aggregate deal value is driven by larger deals, with the number of deals fairly stable. Related tickers mentioned: AMZN, CYBR, GOOG, NFLX.

articles.title: Occidental Petroleum Stock Has Tanked - But It May Hike Its Dividend - Time to Buy?
articles.mainIdea: Occidental Petroleum Stock Has Tanked - But It May Hike Its Dividend - Time to Buy?
articles.summary: Barchart: Occidental Petroleum Stock Has Tanked - But It May Hike Its Dividend - Time to Buy?. Occidental Petroleum Corp could hike its dividend in late January or early February. But OXY stock is still well off its highs. Based on its average dividend yield, OXY could be worth over 25% more at $50 per share. Related tickers mentioned: OXY.
